payload.title: Update crypto_module.md - 7/7 Records Crypto Support
payload.description: Update crypto_module.md blueprint and add crypto tests for ExecutionRecord, ChangelogRecord, FeedbackRecord. Update capability tables to show complete crypto support for all record types and add security failure test cases for the new records.
payload.notes: Updated crypto_module.md with complete 7/7 record type crypto support. Added ExecutionRecord, ChangelogRecord, FeedbackRecord to checksum deterministic tests and signature security failure tests. 30 crypto tests now cover all record types with tampering protection.
